quote: You have to do it. The same way that you don't want to cold call, you don't always have to be in the mood to do social.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to push through discomfort and commit to social media.
suggested_hook: Struggling to stay consistent with social media? Here's why you need to push through.

quote: The fallacy of the stranger... everyone thinks they're going after some random person they have no connection to.
why_clipworthy: Reveals a common misconception about social media lead generation.
suggested_hook: Think social media is about reaching strangers? Think again.
